text: <@UEKMY50SU> I have executed the hs auth command and tried to deploy again but still facing the same error . i did'nt get about scope thing  that you are asking about .can you please tell me how and where i need to add the scope . Is it while executing the deploy command or while using hs auth command ?
when you run `hs auth` it will open a screen to generate a personal access key, which should include the `cms.functions.read_write` scope

<@UEKMY50SU> i got your point , i have checked my scopes i only get these scopes  <https://prnt.sc/1t8ckc4>  by default as i am not the owner of this portal.How can i get access to other scopes as well to work on it ?
you may need to deactivate the key and then re-generate it

Hai all,  am completely new to Node & HubSpot Server less functions - initially I made some functions by GET,POST requests using HubSpot API endpoints like
```<https://api.hubapi.com/contacts/v1/contact/?hapikey=demo>```
But later I found out about HubSpot Client API - which is much more handy on almost all operations of HubSpot
<https://HubSpotwebteam.github.io/hs-node-api/index.html>
Here initial command was to run
```npm install --save HubSpot-api```
am using vs code and connected to my HubSpot account through hs/cli . I just run this command on vs code terminal(inside theme folder) and nothing particularly happened for files/folders in local or HS account . then I tried to code as the tutorial said.
<https://HubSpotwebteam.github.io/hs-node-api/index.html>
```const HubSpotClient = require('HubSpot-api');
const hs = new HubSpotClient({ hapikey });```
But the fist line itself creating an error.. am sure am doing something fundamentally wrong - help me on this.. Thanks..

_Error: Cannot find module 'HubSpot-api'_

how can i include this library to my HubSpot theme/account successfully??
